page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT Essex/CambsBorder
page.content: Unemployment is less than 1%. 75% of employed people work outside the area. Towns which people commute to include Royston, Saffron Walden, Sawston and Cambridge. Also London. Some work at home and in London. 25% of employed people work locally. A few women are employed in domestic work locally. Most farms employ 1 full-time man with extra help at harvest - students and specialist contractors. The largest employer is the Egg Farm - 7 full-time and 3 part-time employees. 25% of the population are retired. Less than 25% of women do no work outside the home.
